description:
This policy enforces a specific time zone setting on Windows devices by locking it to Mountain Standard Time (MST), which corresponds to:

UTC Offset: -07:00

Observed Time Zones:

MST (no daylight saving) – e.g., Phoenix, AZ

MDT (Mountain Daylight Time, if daylight saving is applicable) – e.g., Denver, CO

When enabled:

The user cannot change the system time zone via Settings or Control Panel.

The configured time zone applies to all user profiles and system services.
name: BHC - Windows - Settings Catalog TimeZone
